How to Cancel Spotify Premium

Learn how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the Spotify website, Spotify app, Google Play Store, or iOS App Store. Keep enjoying your Premium benefits until your next billing date.

CANCEL SPOTIFY PREMIUM VIA WEBSITE

Here's how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the website:

  • Go to spotify.com and log in to your account.
  • Click on your profile icon in the top right corner and select "Account".
  • Scroll down to the "Your Plan" section or find the "Manage Subscription" button.
  • Click "Change Plan".
  • Select "Cancel Premium" or the "Spotify Free" option.
  • Confirm your cancellation.
Cancel subscription
